divs: Sighting Detailsdriving when i seen red light in the sky, me and 2 other people in the car seen it turn from slow blinking red spher to no blinking for about 5 seconds the light became dim then it started blinking angain. i slowed down to watch itand it seemed to be just floating in the air about 500-600 feet up. the lights became very bright red then some times it would become almost white in color, seem to be 2 big red lights on the craft on the back part, craft seemed small, maybe as big as a car. this took place at 8:20 pm on oct.30 2008 craft stayed in the same area for about 5 minutes then i drove away but still could see it in the air.
Summary: seen extreamly slow moving redish white ball object
